title: there is a problem with your internet (error)
body: Everytime I open up the client there is a error telling me that there is a problem with my internet connection which there isn't and the only options there are, are restart or  shut down.

replies.body:
I got your solution BOIS! 

When you get the client running and the message in middle. Press alt+f4 and it will ask you to exit the client. Say no and it will redirect you to the login screen without the error.
p.s. Give me a medal ;)

UPDATE 2.0: If that play button don't work just wait a while or do the same process again and it will work like charm.

Cheers,
_Character: Veggie Meat
Role: ADC 
Server: EUW _
